description: A backdoor in Solar-Log Gateway products allows remote access via web panel gaining super administration privileges to the attacker. This affects Solar-Log devices that use firmware version v4.2.7 up to v5.1.1 (included). This does not exist in SL 200, 500, 1000 / fixed in 4.2.8 for SL 250, 300, 1200, 2000, SL 50 Gateway / fixed in 5.1.2 / 6.0.0 for SL Base.
